BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN
PSYCHOLOGY
LEVEL 1
Program Performance
Profile
AREA VIII. PHYSICAL
PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER G - STUDENT CENTER

I. SYSTEMS-INPUTS
AND PROCESS
The Office of the Central Student Government (CSG) is
located at Martina S. Ferrer building in General Trias City Campus. The office is utilized by the CSG and different academic
and non-academic organization of the campus.

II. IMPLEMENTATION
Lay-out of the Cavite State University –General Trias City Campus Office of the Central Student Government.

IV. BEST PRACTICES
⮚ The student center served the students for better reliable information, training,
placement and follow-up services to
students, graduates and other clients
⮚ Provide venues to enrich students’
talents and interests to ensure social and cultural growth;
⮚ Provide financial assistance to the needy and deserving students; and
⮚ Provide counselling and testing to
students, thus recognizing and
accepting themselves and develop their potentials and capabilities

AREA VIII. PHYSICAL
PLANT AND FACILITIES
PARAMETER H – FOOD SERVICES,
CANTEEN AND CAFETERIA

II. IMPLEMENTATION
Display Menu
Tables and Chairs

IV. BEST PRACTICES
⮚ Provide students with delicious and
healthy meals for affordable prices;
⮚ To inspire future generations to
make healthier choice, everyday;
⮚ We source free-range and organic
ingredients from farmers we know and trust as close to our kitchens as
possible; and
⮚ We aim to provide food
appreciation within our healthy and tasty meals on any financial
circumstances of many of our
students.
